actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Soil Conservation and Domestic Allotment Act, as amended, to provide for a Wabash Valley Basin environmental conservation.
short_title: Wabash Valley Basin Environmental Conservation Act

summary.text: Wabash Valley Basin Environmental Conservation Act - Provides for a Wabash Valley Basin environmental conservation program under the Soil Conservation and Domestic Allotment Act. Authorizes the appropriation of such sums as may be necessary to carry out this Act.

titles.title: Wabash Valley Basin Environmental Conservation Act
A bill to amend the Soil Conservation and Domestic Allotment Act, as amended, to provide for a Wabash Valley Basin environmental conservation.
